purpose: Facilitates the integration of AI agents with a vast array of tools and services, enabling seamless function calling and access management.
principle: Leverages multi-tenant authentication and a unified MCP server to manage connections and permissions for AI agents.
reusability: Offers a unified API for integrating various tools, supports multi-tenant environments, and provides granular permission settings.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may imply limited stability and evolving features.
name: aci
description: ACI.dev is the open source platform that connects your AI agents to 600+ tool integrations with multi-tenant auth, granular permissions, and access through direct function calling or a unified MCP server.
highlight: Connects AI agents to over 600 tool integrations with multi-tenant authentication and granular permissions.
